description: Try our easy to follow Feta & Pea Salad With Watercress Mayonnaise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Green salad,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Sesame free
name: Feta & Pea Salad With Watercress Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a food processor, whiz the watercress, mayonnaise, and horseradish sauce until well combined. Taste, and season with salt and black pepper.

Put the feta, peas, spinach, and mint leaves in a bowl, and gently mix through. Season with a little black pepper if you wish. Transfer to a serving bowl, and serve with the mayonnaise and lemon wedges on the side.
